results.title: Treatment with a novel agent combining docosahexaenoate and metformin increases protectin DX and IL-6 production in skeletal muscle and reduces insulin resistance in obese diabetic db/db mice.
results.text_hl: We next tested the long-term glucoregulatory effect of oral @<m>CHEMICAL_TP_113</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:C000624431 @@@TP-113@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Obesity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obese diabetic@@@ db/db @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ and compared its effect to an equivalent dose of @CHEMICAL_Metformin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Mitchell PL, Nachbar R, Lachance D, St-Pierre P, Trottier J, Barbier O, Marette A. Treatment with a novel agent combining docosahexaenoate and metformin increases protectin DX and IL-6 production in skeletal muscle and reduces insulin resistance in obese diabetic db/db mice. Diabetes Obes Metab. 2017 Mar;19(3):313-319. PMID: 27800648
